biotools.summary: Family-based rare variant association tests for normally and non-normally distributed quantitative traits. Calculation of kinship matrices, various options for coping with non-normality, three different ways of estimating statistical significance incorporating triaging to enable efficient use of the most computationally-intensive calculations, and a parallelization option for genome-wide analysis.
